casebody.data:
William Thomas FOX and Scott Everett Sanders
v.
Mitchell JOHNSON, Timothy R. Bellamy, Gary W. Hastings, and Martha T. Kelly, in their individual capacities. No. 26P14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. G. Gray Wilson, Winston-Salem, for Johnson, Mitchell, et al. Stuart H. Russell, Winston-Salem. Lorin J. Lapidus. John C. Vermitsky, Winston-Salem, for Fox, William Thomas, et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th of November 2015 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
EDMUNDS and ERVIN, J. recused.
